title: Using Behavioral Economics for Postsecondary Success
summary: ideas42 released a white paper, funded by the Citi Foundation, that describes how the design of postsecondary education programs could align with principles of behavior to achieve significantly better outcomes. This paper and a corresponding convening that was held on May 23, 2013, are the beginning of ideas42's engagement in this important subject area. Read a blog introducing the paper and download a copy here.
tag-1: Using Behavioral Economics for Postsecondary Success
